title: Sampler, 1820
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross stitches on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Rosanna K. Johnsons Woork (sic) in the 11 year of her Age 1820
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: A very stylized strawberry vine border on three sides encloses scattered motifs and a house.  Signed: Rosanna K. Johnsons Work in the 11 year of her Age 1820
